# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(text::AbstractString, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(text)
    result = []
    line = ""

    for word in words
        if length(line) + length(word) + 1 > text_width
            push!(result, line.rstrip())
            line = $word
        else
            line *= " $(word)"
        end
    end

    push!(result, line.rstrip())
    result
end
```

Example usage:

```julia
julia> wrap_string("Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut vel tortor vitae enim consequat scelerisque. Donec ac ex eu nisl faucibus viverra. Vestibulum ante ipsum primis in faucibus orci luctus et ultrices posuere cubilia Curae; Sed euismod nisl vel erat bibendum, at condimentum velit luctus.")
```
